text:
Code Of Conduct

C o d e   o f   C o n d u c t

As a Member of FACE I agree to:

  • Abide by the Constitution of FACE
  • Abide by the Terms & Conditions of Membership
  • Follow the aims of FACE as laid out in the Constitution
  • Work within the Code of Practice of FACE
  • Represent FACE to the best of my ability
  • Promote FACE
  • Deal fairly with fellow Members
  • Display only my own work and acknowledge any other painters work should I display another face painters pictures
  • Abide by democratically reached decisions of FACE
  • Contribute to the administration of FACE if requested
  • Take an active part in decision making
  • Actively work towards improving my face painting techniques and style by attending jams & conferences where possible, working with a colleague or designated Rep, or self-directed study
  • Keep in touch with my Area Representative
  • Be cautious when posting industry related comments on internet based forums and/or social networking sites

As a Member of FACE I agree NOT to: Misrepresent FACE and any of the Membership or in any way bring FACE into disrepute



FACE Constitution

Olivia Christensen will not be held responsible for any damages caused to the client’s hair during the application process or the removal process. All stylists and consumers agree to use OC products at their own risk. Our products are specifically designed for the use by licensed professionals. We assume that anyone using our products has enough knowledge and experience to use them properly. You as a stylist, must educate your clients how to maintain their hair extensions. ( washing, brushing, using hot tools, etc. )

Salon & Spa Policies

Missed Appointment Policy

Please understand that when you forget or cancel your appointment without giving enough notice, we miss the opportunity to fill that appointment time, and clients on our waiting list miss the opportunity to receive services. Our appointments are confirmed two business days in advance because we know how easy it is to forget an appointment you booked months ago.  Since the service is reserved for you personally, a MISSED APPOINTMENT fee will apply.

As a courtesy, we offer text and/or email confirmations that are sent out two business days prior to your appointment date. However, if we are unable to reach you please understand that it is your responsibility to remember your appointment dates and times to avoid late arrivals, missed appointments and the missed appointment fee.

We Require At Least:

  • 24-hours notice for appointment cancellations
  • 48 hours notice for Spa Package cancellations

Guests who cancel their appointments without proper notice or do not show up for their reserved appointment times are considered a “missed appointment.”

Children’s Policy

Innovations is a family owned business operated by family focused employees. We take the safety and well-being our child guests, as well as, the comfort and relaxation of our adult guests very seriously. In the event you must bring a young child into the salon, please provide proper supervision for them in the form of an additional caretaker. Unfortunately, the salon cannot provide childcare services. Also, young children in carriers/strollers may not be placed near the service areas or held in the lap.

We kindly request ONLY those receiving services be present in the service areas. Older children, (12+) capable of sitting quietly and unsupervised, may wait in the provided seating area. While this policy helps ensure that all guests enjoy a relaxing salon experience, it was created with your child’s safety in mind.

Our salon is not child-proof. Sharp instruments, hot styling tools, chemicals and a busy, congested area make for a potentially dangerous environment for young children.

We greatly appreciate your compliance with our child safety policy.

Prices Policy

We are constantly expanding our services to bring you the latest and greatest. Although we make every effort to keep our website and spa menu updated, please note that prices and services are subject to change at any time.

Our salon staff works on a “Level System” which measures experience and years of dedication. Those at higher levels are more often educators and lecturers that have established a high client demand. This encourages stability and allows our employees to grow and prosper based on years of loyalty and dedication to their profession and clients. We provide artists at every level to best suit the needs of our clients.

Special Considerations

Please notify Guest Services before reserving your appointment if you have high blood pressure, allergies, any other physical ailments or disabilities, or if you are pregnant. If you have any concerns at all, please let us know. If at any time during your services you experience discomfort, please alert your service provider immediately.

Payments & Gratuities’

We accept cash, MasterCard and Visa. Personal checks are also accepted accompanied with a valid drivers license.

Gratuity is not included in the service fees listed on our menu.

Orders $50 and over ship for free!


By booking an appointment at Bang Bang Beauty Bar you have agreed to our terms and conditions (T+C’s). 

Please keep in mind when reading that these terms and conditions are ultimately just a general courtesy that should be given to any appointment based business.

Although it’s understandable that it might be difficult to attend appointments on occasion, we have put these T+C’s in place to protect our best interests and those of our loyal client base.

Please read our terms and conditions below

  • It is the clients responsibility to make sure we have all the correct contact details upon booking. It is also important to keep a record of your booking on hand. If you have entered the wrong phone number we will not be held responsible if you do not receive a confirmation text due to incorrect details. If your regular phone number is often unattended please provide us with an alternative contact number and save your booking to your calendar.
  • Bang Bang Beauty Bar will not hold appointments. If you have contacted us for an appointment and we are waiting to hear back from you to confirm a given time we will not hold that appointment until you have confirmed it. 
  • We kindly ask that clients notify us of the need to reschedule or cancel appointments at least 24 hours before the scheduled appointment. 
  • Cancellations of your scheduled appointment must be made no less than 12 hours prior to your scheduled appointment time. If less than 12 hours notice is given 10% of your booking fee will be charged. 
  • If you do not show up to your scheduled appointment or cancel within 1 hour of your appointment this is considered a “No Show’. You will automatically forfeit a fee of 30% of the cost of your booking and you will be required to pay the remaining cost of your missed appointment before you can make any further bookings.
  • Regular No shows or cancellations are a no go. Re-offending clients will have to prepay future appointments, will be denied access to the online booking system and given restricted hours / days in which they can book. 
  • Running late to your appointment puts stress on our schedule. If you think you are going to be late to your appointment please let us know as soon as possible so we can make a note on your booking and do our best to accommodate.
  • If our team decides they can see you, but has to reduce your treatment to prevent interrupting other appointments, the original charge for the appointment will still apply.
  • If you are late to an appointment without notice or have missed the majority of your appointment this is considered a ‘No Show’ and we will charge 30% of the cost of the appointment immediately and require the balance of your to be paid before you can make any further appointments. 
  • If your appointment has to be rescheduled because we are unable to accommodate you, this is considered as a ‘No Show’ and we will charge 30% of the cost of the appointment immediately and require the balance of your to be paid before you can make any further appointments. 
  • It is not acceptable to show up late and ask for a reduced treatment, while expecting to be charged for the lesser time.
  • Booking in for a particular service and then changing your mind at your appointment as to what service you require is not acceptable. We designate the correct time for each client. If you request for a lesser treatment the original booking will be charged. If you request for additional treatments, please discuss with your therapist to see if this can be accommodated. When making online bookings, it is your responsibility to make sure you have booked all the services you require at your appointment.
  • Letting us know ahead of time if there is a possibility of needing to reschedule / revise your appointment is much appreciated. It is likely we can accommodate moving you to a more appropriate time and adding or subtracting services if several days notice is given.
  • If you act in any way that is abusive towards staff or clients, we have the right to deny service and to ask you to leave the premises.
  • We encourage parents to visit our salon without children (aged 12 and under), unless the child is attending an appointment. We mean no disrespect to our client’s with children and put this policy forward with respect to our clients well being and that of our staff. Your treatment and the attention of your therapist is of the utmost importance to us and past experiences have helped us arrive at this policy.  

  • We work in a semi-open studio. In any given space we use sharps, needles, chemicals & hot wax – these are not only hazardous to children but dangerous to our clients and staff in the event of unexpected noise or movements. Children (aged 12 and under) in or near these spaces pose a risk to the salon for OHS and for insurance reasons.
  • We have a waiting area in our salon space, however it is not encouraged to leave children (aged 12 and under) unattended in this area. Please consider supervision for all children in this area. Loud noises in the waiting area or treatment rooms is unacceptable.
  • If children must attend an appointment with you and require Ipads, phones, etc they must have headphones or no sound. Again this is important for the concentration of our therapist and the respect of other customers.
  • Please contact us if you have any queries or concerns regarding our Children Policy.

Privacy Policy | Last updated 05/04/2020

We, at Bang Bang Beauty Bar, respect the privacy of our clients and users of this site. The linked Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website (bangbangbeautybar.com), including any other media form, media channel, mobile website, or mobile application related or connected thereto bangbangbeautybar.com. Please read our privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site.

We reserve the right to make changes to our Privacy Policy at any time and for any reason. We will alert you about any changes by updating the “Last Updated” date of this Privacy Policy. Any changes or modifications will be effective immediately upon linking the updated Privacy Policy on the Site, and you waive the right to receive specific notice of each such change or modification.

You are encouraged to periodically review our Privacy Policy to stay informed of updates. You will be deemed to have been made aware of, will be subject to, and will be deemed to have accepted the changes in any revised Privacy Policy by your continued use of the Site after the date such revised Privacy Policy is posted.

Apply to be a Le Fleur brand rep


The Contract Period

The Brand Rep will be in contract for a period of 2 months. If things work out for both, we will extend the terms for a longer period of time that both parties agree on. You must be of 18 years or older.

What’s Involved As A Brand Rep

– Having a public and very active Instagram account. You must have good engagement on your posts to qualify. You must have @lefleurbtq listed in your bio.

– Genuine love, support, and enthusiasm for the products and brand shown in comments on Instagram. If we find that you are buying your likes or comments, you forfeit your contract.

– Actively searches #lefleurbtq and associated hashtags. Comments on other people’s photos and shows support for other brand reps.

– Promotes the brand on your own social media through photography wearing their clothing twice a month or once every 2 weeks. Please capture photos clear and free from clutter as much as possible. Photos need to be a full body shot.

– Email unwatermarked photos to lefleurbtq@gmail.com so we can share too! Any photos sent will become property of Le Fleur Boutique and may be used as we see fit for the brand.

– Promotes and shares company announcements such as promotions, contests, launches, and events.

– Le Fleur reserves the right to use any and all photographs on all social media accounts, promotional flyers and all advertisements.

What The Brand Rep Gets In Return

– A unique 25% off code to be used on all items purchased. All items purchased must be promoted. If we find you are abusing the discount without promoting the items, your contract will be forfeited.

– Lots of love, support, and appreciation

– Exposure on Le Fleur’s social media outlets

End Contract

We have the right to withdraw you from the contract at anytime, without question if we find you are not abiding to all the terms and conditions.

After you have placed your order, instylenewyork.com will send you an automatic e-mail confirmation for your order process has begun. This does not constitute confirmation of the sale since we need to confirm product availability manually. Your credit card will not be charged until your order has been accepted. Instylenewyork.com reserves the right to refuse to sell items if they are in production, not available, have incorrect pricing due to software errors or have been cancelled or not passed inspection. Once your order is shipped you will receive a notification e-mail with the tracking number to track your order with the carrier.
Once your order has been scanned by shipper you can check the status of your order by utilizing your tracking number at the shipper website.
Please make sure your email is accurate and add our email help@instylenewyork.com to your white list so it will not be flagged as spam. Phone numbers are optional but we recommend adding it as it will help our team members to contact you regarding your order and service you better.

Stock availability
All products are subject to availability. Most of our in stock products will be shipped out within 7-10 business days. Orders must be placed before 2pm EST in order to be processed the same business day. All orders placed after 2pm EST will be processed the next business day.
If you order more than one item, you may receive your order in more than one shipment. You will be notified of the status of your order via email or you can check the status of your order anytime online.

Special Order
Special orders are orders for dresses that are not available for immediate shipping but will become available at a later date. Some special orders has to be made once we place it with our designers. Please indicate your desired Wear Date. Once you place a special order we will notify you about the delivery date and upon your approval the order will be processed. No cancellation accepted for special orders once it was placed and confirmed, we will charge up to 50% of the order value as a cancellation fee.
Once you approve the delivery date we will charge your card.

Pre-orders are orders placed on merchandise that is not in stock for immediate delivery but will be shipped at the date indicate on the site. By placing a pre-order, you will be receiving your order as the item becomes available. If you order a Pre-Order item, and the delivery date will be within 25 days of your order date your credit card will be charged once the order has been accepted. If the delivery date is longer than 25 days ,you will be notified via email and your card will be charged.
All pre-order dates are subject to change. If a pre-order date falls on a Saturday or Sunday, the merchandise will be shipped the next business day. All Cancellations of Pre-Order items will incur up to 50% cancellation fee.

Order Cancellation
You may cancel your order as long as your order has not been processed. Once an order has been processed and confirmed (i.e., payment verified and item ordered and invoiced by our designers), you cannot cancel your order. All Cancellations on instock items will incur up to $35 cancellation fee.
Once your order is shipped, you cannot cancel. Orders shipped and refused by customers will incur up to 50% restocking fee plus shipping charges that will be debited from your account.
To cancel your order, please e-mail to help@instylenewyork.com.

Sales Tax
All orders are shipped out of New York City. New York State sales tax is applied only to orders shipped within New York state.

Methods of Payment
instylenewyork.com accepts the following forms of payment: American Express, Visa, MasterCard, Discover, Western Union ,Money Order ,Bank Transfer and instylenewyork.com gift certificates, instylenewyork.com does not accept personal checks, certified checks or COD.
All customers are subject to credit card verification. When your credit card is authorized; the payment is processed. Your billing information must be exactly as it appears on your credit card statement. If any of the information differs, the order will not be processed.
If your Shipping Address is different than your Billing Address, we are required to verify this information with your bank or your credit card company. As a result, your order may be subject to delay. Please allow 48 to 72 hours for the verification process. To help expedite this process, we ask you to contact your credit card company or your bank and add the alternative shipping address to your account. You may also e-mail us at help@instylenewyork.com a picture ID with the cardholders name on it, authorizing us to ship to a different address other then the billing.

credit card logospacerWestern Union

International buyers
Please note that international orders go through a manual credit card verification process which may cause a delay of 1 to 2 business days to your order. We accept all major credit cards such as American Express, Visa, and MasterCard and reccommend you contact your issuer and authorize that you are making a international purchase so they can clear the charge .

Money Orders
If you would like to pay with money order, you may contact us at help@instylenewyork.com for more information.
Please contact us and notify us that your payment has been sent so we can reserve your order. Orders will be held only for 5 days from the day you placed your order

Bank Transfer
Instyle New York accepts domestic or international bank transfer. Please contact us at help@instylenewyork.com for more information.

Charlie's Angels 


Set out below are the terms on which Charlies Angels Aesthetics provides service to its clients. Please ensure that you have read and fully understood them prior to booking any CA Aesthetic treatment.

Appointment Cancellation Policy

We kindly ask that if you wish to cancel or reschedule your appointment, that you give us at least 48 hours’ notice. Any deposits paid for treatments will be lost if 48 hours is not given.

This policy is in place out of respect for our staff members and clients. Cancellations with less than 48 hours’ notice are difficult to fill.

Lateness Policy

If for any reason you are running late to your appointment please call us on 0203 7313244.

We work very hard to schedule the right amount of time for each treatment. Accommodating late clients is often impossible without disrupting every other clients scheduled that day. Please be aware in the unfortunate event you are late, we cannot guarantee that your treatment will be performed that day. Lateness of 10 minutes or more will require rescheduling your appointment for another day and the loss of your deposit.

Deposits for Appointments

There is a £50 deposit payable for all aesthetic appointments and deposits will be redeemable against any treatment on the day.


Deposits are non-refundable; however, deposits are fully refundable if 48 hours’ notice is given for any cancelations, or if you are deemed unsuitable for treatment. Please see our lateness policy as deposits will be forfeited if you are past the cut off time to carry out your treatment.

No Shows

In the event you do not show up to your appointment, you will lose the deposit paid to secure the appointment and you will be required to give a deposit for your next appointment. If you miss three consecutive appointments without contacting the clinic, you will be unable to schedule future appointments.


If after your appointment you are not satisfied with your service, we ask you to please contact the clinic within 7 days of that service to inform the clinic. the practitioner will advise you of the amount of wrinkle relaxing and/or filler being administered on the day, and should you want more units injected at a review, this is possible but will carry a further service charge. We would always advise to wait at least 3 weeks for any fillers to settle within the treatment area before looking at administering additional filler in to the treatment area. Unless in case of emergency, please notify the clinic immediately, however this would be incredibly rare.

Gift Vouchers

No refunds will be given for gift voucher purchases. Gift vouchers are NOT redeemable for cash. Gift vouchers are valid for 12 months from the date of purchase. Gift vouchers are redeemable only against products and services. If change is required this will be given in the form of a credit on your client record at the clinic to be redeemed on your next visit.


children are not allowed in the clinic.

Special COVID-19 Policies

In compliance with the State of Minnesota and the Board of Cosmetology, the following are new safety procedures that must be followed.

Booking Appointments:

  • All guests wanting to book an appointment must fill out and submit an Appointment Request Form found on our website.
  • Guest Services will contact clients after receiving their Appointment Request form. Please allow up to 1-2 days for a response due to the large influx of requests.
  • Phones support is limited and may go directly to voicemail while requests are in high demand. Please feel free to leave a message if you have questions or email and we will contact you as soon as possible.

Entering building to receive services:

  • Please arrive 5 minutes early for your appointment. Late arrivals may not be able to be serviced.
  • Guests entering will be BY APPOINTMENT ONLY
  • Only the guest receiving the service may enter (except in the case of a care giver or parent for a child cut service).
  • Guests must wait in their vehicles or outside on the patio following social distancing guidelines. All waiting rooms have been temporarily closed.
  • Upon arrival for appointment, text your name to the number posted on signs outside the building. This is our temporary contact-less check-in process.
  • When the Service Provider is ready and sanitation protocols are completed, you will receive a reply text letting you know you may now enter. A Service Provider or a Guest Service member will meet you at the front door.
  • Before entering, screening survey questions must be responded to.
  • If all responses are “no”, you may be admitted access to enter.
  • All guests are required to wear a mask for the entire time they are in the building. If you do not have a mask, we have them available to purchase for $2.
  • For hair services, masks must loop around ears or be taped to face.
  • If your service does not allow for a mask to be worn during the service (facial, facial waxing, etc), a touch-less temperature check will be completed before admittance.
  • Gloves are not required. However, if you prefer to wear gloves while here you may bring a new clean pair of gloves to put on after hand-washing has been completed, or you may buy a pair from us for $2.
  • Please limit the number of personal items being brought into the building. Cell phones will be UV light sanitized upon arrival.
  • Guests will be asked to immediately wash their hands upon entering building.
  • Once handwashing is completed, you will be escorted directly to the proper station or room to begin service.


  • To reduce possible contamination, and to ensure masks remain in place the entire time guests are in building:
  • We will not be offering beverages or snacks at this time.
  • Guests are also not allowed to bring their own beverages or snacks.

Receiving services:

  • Masks must be worn at all times. If your mask must be removed for certain services (facial, facial waxing, etc.) we will instruct you when to remove your mask and when to reapply it.
  • If you have experienced any flu-like symptoms, have been exposed to any persons experiencing symptoms, or have been diagnosed with COVID-19 within the last 30 days, please reschedule your appointment. No cancellation or rescheduling fees will be charged!
  • Hair services- We are unable to offer any blow drying at this time. Please arrive with your hair clean, dry and straight, unless you wear your hair in its natural curly state.  All haircuts will be done dry and before color services.
  • We reserve the right to refuse service.

Service Completion:

  • Rebooking your next appointment will be done chair-side for all salon and nail services or in the front waiting room for all skin care and massage services.
  • Any retail you wish to purchase will be brought to you.
  • Checkout is CONTACTLESS and will happen chair-side for all salon and nail service, in the front waiting room for all skin care and massage services.
  • All guests MUST have a credit card on file to complete checkout. All stored card numbers are encrypted for security.
  • Cash will not be accepted for checkout. If you prefer to leave cash gratuity for your service provider, it must be put in the UV light sanitizer before it can be given to service provider.

Cancellation Policy:

  • Minimum 24 hour notice to cancel or reschedule appointments.
  • 50% of service total charged to card on file.
  • NO FEE or minimum time requirement to reschedule or cancel appointments if you are experiencing symptoms or have been exposed to someone experiencing symptoms of COVID-19. Appointment may be rescheduled at a minimum of 3 weeks in the future.

Phresh Spa Salon Policies

To ensure a relaxing experience and allow time to fill out any necessary personal information, please arrive 15 minutes prior to your reservation. Arriving late for your appointment may require us to shorten the length of your service or reschedule your appointment. If you are running late for your appointment, please call us and let us know and we will do our best to accommodate you.


  • Out of respect to our guests and our service providers, a 24 hour cancellation notice is required on individual services. Any no-show or cancellation less than 24 hours prior to the start of the appointment will be charged 50% of the total scheduled services. A valid credit card on file is required to book services.

Group Cancellation Policy

  • All parties of two or more require a valid credit card or gift card on file to confirm the group appointments. Any no-show or cancellation less than 48 hours prior to the start of the appointment will be charged 50% of the total scheduled services.

Multiple Service Policy

  • When booking three or more services on one day a valid credit card or gift card will be required. Any no-show or cancellation less than 48 hours prior to the start of the appointment will be charged 50% of the total scheduled services.

Online Appointment Cancellations

  • To cancel or make changes to your online reservation, please call our guest services at 651.288.4040.

Payment Method

  • We accept all major credit cards. We do not accept checks. Cash gratuity in the exact amount will be accepted and will be UV sterilized prior to receipt by your service provider. Prices are subject to change without notice.


  • Unopened, unused products may be returned within seven (7) days for a full refund. Sales are final on all clearance items.

Our Promise

  • Unlike other spas and salons, we practice the highest form of team service. Our team members are non-commissioned and will all strive to bring out the best in you and deliver a delightful experience. If for any reason you are not satisfied with your service or experience, please contact us and we will do everything we can to make it right.

** Phresh Spa Salon adds a 4% wellness surcharge to each guest purchase to proudly support our commitment to high safety and sanitization standards and employee wellness benefits including sick time pay and health insurance.

For custom made order, it may take a few more days as well. When you placed an online order, you will get our email regarding the tracking information for our side.

Delivery Method:

Every order will be shipped using DHL or FedEx to guarantee prompt and quick delivery with ease and convenience.

Return & Exchange:
